item.title: 华尔街对特朗普与马斯克口水战的反应以及特斯拉股票的下一步走势
item.description: 几个月来，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统政府中扮演的角色让特斯拉股东备受煎熬。但随着上周马斯克正式退出政府，这家电动汽车制造商的首席执行官与他的前老板进行了激烈的争吵，马斯克带来的任何宽慰都很快变成了恐惧。【原文：For months, Tesla shareholders were tormented by Elon Musk’s role in the administration of President Donald Trump. But any relief brought by his formal government exit last week quickly turned to fear as the electric-vehicle maker’s chief executive traded barbs with his former boss.】

item.title: 美团将在迪拜码头上空扩展无人机配送路线
item.description: 作为雄心勃勃的海外扩张计划的一部分，美团正在迪拜扩展其无人机送货服务。【原文：Meituan is expanding its drone delivery service in Dubai as part of an ambitious overseas push.】

item.title: 尽管关税存在不确定性，美国公司五月仍可能留住员工
item.description: 美国 5 月份的招聘可能进一步放缓，失业率变化不大，这表明雇主们尚未因唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策而对员工人数做出重大调整。【原文：US hiring likely moderated further in May and the unemployment rate was little changed, suggesting employers are yet to implement big changes to their headcount in response to President Donald Trump’s trade policy.】

item.title: 市场综述：亚洲股市在华尔街下跌后面临压力
item.description: 周五，在美国就业数据可能有助于确定美联储未来的减产路径之前，亚洲股市追随华尔街的跌势而出现下跌。【原文：Asian equities were primed for losses on Friday, tracking falls on Wall Street ahead of US jobs data that may help identify the path ahead for Federal Reserve cuts.】

item.title: Citadel 证券公司总裁称美国赤字是一颗 "定时炸弹
item.description: Citadel 证券公司总裁吉姆-埃斯波西托（Jim Esposito）说，美国的财政赤字和不断攀升的政府债务水平是一颗 "定时炸弹"。【原文：Citadel Securities President Jim Esposito said the US deficit and mounting government debt levels are a “ticking time bomb,” adding his voice to the chorus of financial executives soundings warnings about America’s deteriorating fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 台湾货币市场利率下滑可能推迟央行宽松政策
item.description: 上个月台币飙升刺激了大量资金涌入，使当地货币市场利率降至一年多来的最低水平，并有可能推迟中央银行的货币宽松政策。【原文：A surge in the Taiwanese dollar last month spurred an influx of funds, driving local money-market rates to the lowest level in more than a year and potentially delaying monetary easing by the central bank.】

item.title: 港元跌至弱势区间可能是短暂的
item.description: 由于预测美元走软以及季节性因素的影响，预计港元受压的时间将短于近期的疲软。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar is expected to spend a shorter amount of time under pressure than recent bouts of weakness, thanks to forecasts for a softer greenback and seasonal factors.】

item.title: 交易员从日本年度会议文件中寻找激进分子线索
item.description: 交易员们正在搜索年度股东大会的通知，以捕捉日本公司中激进派持股的信号，并从潜在的股价飙升中获利。【原文：Traders are scouring notices of annual general meetings to pick up signals about activist holdings in Japanese companies and profit from potential spikes in stock prices.】

item.title: Kling 人工智能视频生成器有望在二月前实现 1 亿美元的销售额
item.description: Kling AI 现在是全球收入最高的视频生成器之一，据其制造商瓜分科技公司称，它有望在今年 2 月实现 1 亿美元的销售额。【原文：Kling AI is now one of the world’s top-earning video generators and on track to deliver $100 million in sales by February, according to its maker Kuaishou Technology.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 上手体验：更大的屏幕、更快的芯片不负众望
item.description: 任天堂公司的 Switch 2 的到来标志着 2025 年迄今为止最大规模的消费类科技产品发布，大批玩家正在开箱并首次尝试这款价值 450 美元的新游戏机。【原文：The arrival of Nintendo Co.’s Switch 2 marks the biggest consumer tech product release of 2025 so far, with legions of gamers now unboxing and trying the new $450 gaming console for the first time.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克与特朗普的恩怨引发了他有史以来最严重的财富损失之一
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在网络上的公开争吵，一分一秒、一个帖子一个帖子地侵蚀着他自诩的世界首富地位。【原文：Minute by minute, post by post, Elon Musk’s very public, extremely online feud with President Donald Trump sliced into his vaunted status as the world’s richest person.】

item.title: 加密货币基金抨击 Circle IPO 忽视加密货币原住民
item.description: 并非所有人都在庆祝 Circle Internet Group Inc.【原文：Not everyone was celebrating the success of Circle Internet Group Inc.’s initial public offering on Thursday.】

item.title: Circle 的疯狂交易首秀提升了加密货币 IPO 的前景
item.description: Circle Internet Group Inc.周四的火爆上市给美国首次公开募股市场注入了一针加密货币兴奋剂，这可能会鼓励更多的首次公开募股公司在数字资产领域和其他领域上市。【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc.’s white-hot debut on Thursday gives the US IPO market a crypto-fuelled shot of adrenalin that could encourage more listings by would-be debutantes — in the digital assets space and beyond.】

item.title: 泰国央行行长候选人支持大幅降息
item.description: 泰国央行新行长候选人之一颂普拉温-曼普拉塞特（Somprawin Manprasert）认为，鉴于泰国经济增长前景黯淡、通胀低迷，泰国应该更加积极地削减借贷成本。【原文：Thailand should be more aggressive in cutting borrowing costs given its bleak growth outlook and subdued inflation, according to Somprawin Manprasert, one of the candidates seeking to become the Bank of Thailand’s new governor.】

item.title: 特朗普与卡尼在七国集团峰会前就贸易问题举行会谈
item.description: 据熟悉讨论情况的人士称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和加拿大总理马克-卡尼一直在直接接触，试图达成一项贸易协议，但双方仍需努力才能达成协议。【原文：US President Donald Trump and Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney have been in direct contact trying to reach a trade deal, but the two sides still have work to do to find agreement, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 马斯克称 SpaceX 将立即退役 "龙 "飞船
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他将退役 SpaceX 公司为美国向国际空间站运送货物和人员的 "龙 "飞船，这使得这位亿万富翁与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）之间长达数日的争吵升级。【原文：Elon Musk said he was going to decommission SpaceX’s Dragon spacecraft that ferries cargo and people to the International Space Station for the US, escalating a dayslong spat between the billionaire and President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 博通公司发布不温不火的预测，削弱了人们的高期望值
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom Inc. 是 Alphabet 公司和苹果公司等公司的芯片供应商）对本季度的收入预测乏善可陈，这表明人工智能消费热潮并不像一些投资者预期的那样强劲。【原文：Broadcom Inc., a chip supplier to companies like Alphabet Inc. and Apple Inc., gave a lackluster revenue forecast for the current quarter, suggesting that the AI spending frenzy isn’t as strong as some investors anticipated.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚债券因财政规则可能暂停的报道而下跌
item.description: 哥伦比亚主权美元债券周四全线下跌，因为当地媒体报道称，政府可能暂停实施限制预算支出并帮助稳定市场长达十多年的财政规则。【原文：Colombia’s sovereign dollar bonds dropped across the curve on Thursday after local media reported that the government might suspend the fiscal rule that limited budget spending and helped steady the markets for more than a decade.】

item.title: 美国避免使用 "汇率操纵国 "标签，抨击中国
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统上任以来对美国贸易伙伴外汇交易行为的首次正式评估中，美国财政部拒绝点名任何国家为汇率操纵国，但特别指出中国 "缺乏透明度"。【原文：In the first formal assessment of US trading partners’ foreign-exchange practices since President Donald Trump returned to office, the Treasury Department declined to name any country a currency manipulator while singling China out for “its lack of transparency.”】

item.title: 沃尔玛加强无人机送货以加快订单速度
item.description: 沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc. ）将在五个新城市增加无人机送货服务，以扩大在线销售，更快地将商品送到购物者手中。【原文：Walmart Inc. is adding drone delivery in five new cities in a bid to expand online sales and get goods to shoppers faster.】

item.title: Perplexity AI 首席执行官对谷歌的人工智能推广和助理产品提出质疑
item.description: Perplexity AI Inc.首席执行官阿拉温德-斯里尼瓦斯（Aravind Srinivas）对谷歌的人工智能产品和战略大加指责，这是这家人工智能搜索初创公司对其竞争对手最强烈的批评。【原文：Perplexity AI Inc. Chief Executive Officer Aravind Srinivas issued a broadside against Google’s artificial intelligence products and strategy, marking some of the AI search startup’s strongest criticisms of its rival.】

item.title: 参议院将在税收法案中保留频谱销售，主要共和党人表示
item.description: 一位重要的共和党人说，参议员们已经达成协议，重新授权向互联网公司出售频谱，这将产生数十亿美元的收入，用于资助美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面减税和支出法案。【原文：A key Republican said senators have reached an agreement to reauthorize spectrum sales to internet companies that would generate billions of dollars in revenue toward funding US President Donald Trump’s sweeping tax cuts and spending bill.】

item.title: 一桩悬而未决的大案让音乐产业在流媒体欺诈问题上既团结又分裂
item.description:
音乐界仍在争论谁应负责打击虚假流媒体活动

。【原文：

The music world is still debating over who should be responsible for cracking down on bogus streaming activity

】

item.title: 加拿大油砂排放强度连续六年下降
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省政府周四公布的最新数据显示，加拿大油砂行业在 2023 年连续第六年减少了每桶油砂的排放量，尽管该行业中越来越大的一部分正朝着相反的方向发展。【原文：Canada’s oil sands industry reduced its emissions per barrel for the sixth straight year in 2023, even as one growing portion of the sector moved in the opposite direction, according to new Alberta government data released Thursday.】

item.title: 葡萄牙称可能在 2025 年达到 2% 的国防开支目标
item.description: 葡萄牙总理路易斯-黑山（Luis Montenegro）表示，葡萄牙将努力在 2025 年实现国防开支占国内生产总值 2% 的目标，这比最初的目标提前了四年。【原文：Portugal will try to reach its defense spending target of 2% of gross domestic product in 2025, four years ahead of its initial goal, Prime Minister Luis Montenegro said.】

item.title: Peloton 首席执行官称无意出售公司
item.description: Peloton Interactive Inc.首席执行官彼得-斯特恩（Peter Stern）表示，在他努力扭亏为盈的同时，他无意出售该公司，并誓言将其保持为 "一家独立的公司"。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. Chief Executive Officer Peter Stern said he has no interest in selling the business while he works on a turnaround, vowing to keep it “a standalone company.”】

item.title: OpenAI 和 Benchmark 支持来自前 OpenAI 员工的新创公司
item.description:
由人工智能巨头前员工组成的初创企业侨民队伍日益壮大。【原文：

There’s a growing startup diaspora of former employees from the AI giant. 

】

item.title: 美联储调查显示，企业预计将转嫁50%的关税
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行的一项最新调查显示，企业预计将把大约一半的关税相关支出转嫁给仍在大流行病时期通胀飙升中挣扎的美国消费者。【原文：Business expect to pass through roughly half of tariff-related expenses to US consumers still reeling from the pandemic-era inflation surge, according to a new survey from the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta.】

item.title: Accel 表示，价值超过 10 亿美元的科技初创企业中约有 20% 会失败
item.description: 风险投资公司 Accel Partners 的合伙人 Rich Wong 说，目前有 1000 多家科技独角兽公司，即由风险投资支持的价值 10 亿美元或以上的公司，但至少有五分之一可能会失败。【原文：There are more than 1,000 technology unicorns, meaning venture backed companies worth $1 billion or more, but at least 1 in 5 are likely to fail, Rich Wong, a partner at venture capital firm Accel Partners.】

item.title: 亚洲认为特朗普提出的国防开支占国内生产总值 5%的目标不切实际
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推动印度洋-太平洋地区的盟国增加军费开支，以应对来自中国和朝鲜等国日益增长的威胁，但这一举措正遭遇财政限制和债券市场动荡的严峻现实。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s push for Indo-Pacific allies to ramp up military spending to counter growing threats from the likes of China and North Korea is running into the hard reality of fiscal limits and jittery bond markets.】
